```css
// Property: rightButtonMode
// Description: Determines when to display the right button view.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.TextField
'.right-button-mode-always': { rightButtonMode: Ti.UI.INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ALWAYS }
'.right-button-mode-never': { rightButtonMode: Ti.UI.INPUT_BUTTONMODE_NEVER }
'.right-button-mode-onblur': { rightButtonMode: Ti.UI.INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ONBLUR }
'.right-button-mode-onfocus': { rightButtonMode: Ti.UI.INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ONFOCUS }
```
